snippet: Many prospective buyers cross-shop in Tuscany, Umbria and Liguria, as well as the South of France. But prices in the Italian Piedmont are much lower.
lead_paragraph: Many prospective buyers cross-shop in Tuscany, Umbria and Liguria, as well as the South of France. But prices in the Italian Piedmont are much lower.

headline.print_headline: House Hunting in ... the Italian Piedmont
headline.main: House Hunting in ... the Italian Piedmont
